content: free crochet pattern on my website here http //www niftynnifer com/2018/01/free-crochet-pattern-chihuahua-sweater html **using my chihuahua s measurements** chest = 15 1/2 inches neck = 10 1/2 inches waist 12 1/2 inches shoulder blades to base of tail = 14 inches you can try this project on your chihuahua as you work tou will need less than one skien of yarn **materials required ** 4 5 mm crochet hook row markers darning needle red heart super saver stripes yarn medium 4 colour cool stripe 2x 1 inch buttons 1 larger button optional for collar **gauge ** using a measuring tape approximately 4 row = 2 inches approximately 6 half_double_crochet = 2 inches i measured my gauge on body of finished project i ve included some measurements along the way find pattern here http //www niftynnifer com/2018/01/free-crochet-pattern-chihuahua-sweater html
